## How to Use

1. **Lottie (JSON)**: Use with [LottieFiles](https://lottiefiles.com/) or the [Lottie library](https://airbnb.io/lottie/#/).
2. **SVG/PNG**: Simply download and add it to your project.

## Download
All files are available in the `/assets` folder.
